robowars
Class HitByBulletEvent

java.lang.Object
  robowars.AbstractEvent
      robowars.HitByBulletEvent
public final class HitByBulletEvent
extends AbstractEvent

Represents bullet hitting a robot. An object of this class is passed to the event handler routine onHitByBullet. The conventions regarding axes and angles are the same as in Robot.

Method Summary
 Bullet getBullet()
          returns the bullet hitting the robot.
 double getHealth()
          returns the health of the robot when it was hit.
 double getOrientation()
          returns robot's orientation in radians when it was hit.
 java.lang.String getOtherRoboName()
          returns the name of the robot that fired the bullet.
 double getVelocityX()
          returns the x component of the robot's velocity when it was hit.
 double getVelocityY()
          returns the y component of the robot's velocity when it was hit.
 double getX()
          returns the x coordinate of the robot's center when it was hit.
 double getY()
          returns the y coordinate of the robot's center when it was hit.
 boolean isStalled()
          tells if the robot was stalled when it was hit A robot gets stalled on making insufficient calls to its update method

public final boolean isStalled()
tells if the robot was stalled when it was hit A robot gets stalled on making insufficient calls to its update method
